validations.title: All Files Present

validations.title: TWRP File Not Empty

troubleshooting.solution: Re-run wget with -c flag to resume from where it stopped
This is the TeamWin error page (HTML). Delete and re-download using browser - must save actual .img file
Check internet connection, try alternate mirror, or increase timeout: wget --timeout=30
Try parallel downloads, check WiFi signal, or use VPN to bypass ISP throttling

warnings: CRITICAL: TWRP must be downloaded via browser - direct wget fails
Verify file sizes match expected sizes - no partial downloads

phases.title: Device Preparation
phases.description: Configure OnePlus 7 Pro settings for unlocking and flashing

on_device_steps.title: Enable Developer Options
instructions: Open Settings app on OnePlus 7 Pro
Tap 'Build number' 7 times until message 'You are now a developer'
Go back, scroll down to find 'Developer Options'

on_device_steps.title: Remove Screen Locks
instructions: This prevents issues during bootloader unlock

checklist.verification: Toggle shows ON in Developer Options
Toggle shows ON in Developer Options

validations.title: USB Debugging Option Visible
validations.description: Developer Options must be visible in Settings

commands_to_run_on_ubuntu.title: Connect device via USB
commands_to_run_on_ubuntu.description: Plug OnePlus 7 Pro into Ubuntu machine with USB cable
commands_to_run_on_ubuntu.verification: Check device appears in file manager or lsusb output

commands_to_run_on_ubuntu.title: Authorize ADB connection
commands_to_run_on_ubuntu.description: On device: When ADB authorization dialog appears, tap 'Allow' or 'OK'

warnings: USB Debugging MUST be enabled before proceeding
OEM Unlock MUST be enabled or bootloader unlock will fail
Remove ALL Google accounts - they can interfere with setup
Remove screen locks or Flash Tool may fail
Keep device plugged in via USB throughout all phases
prerequisites: OnePlus 7 Pro physically connected via USB

phases.title: Bootloader Unlock
phases.data_loss_warning: ⚠️ CRITICAL: This will erase ALL data on device! Backup important files before proceeding.

commands.title: Reboot to Bootloader/Fastboot
commands.description: Device will reboot into fastboot mode
commands.expected_output: Device reboots, disappears from adb, appears in fastboot

commands.title: Verify Fastboot Connection
commands.description: Confirm device appears in fastboot

commands.title: Unlock Bootloader (WARNING: Data Loss!)
commands.description: Execute unlock command
commands.expected_output: Device will ask for confirmation on screen

commands.title: Confirm on Device Screen
commands.description: On device: Device will show bootloader menu with options
sub_steps: Navigate using volume up/down buttons to 'Unlock'
Device will perform factory reset and reboot
commands.warning: Device will wipe all data - this is normal

commands.title: Wait for Reboot (5-10 minutes)
commands.description: Device will boot into new user setup wizard after data wipe
commands.expected_output: Device shows welcome screen or setup wizard

commands.title: Skip Device Setup
commands.description: On device: Press back button repeatedly or swipe left to skip setup screens
commands.note: We'll flash ROM immediately, so don't complete setup

commands.title: Enable USB Debugging Again
commands.description: Device was wiped, so USB Debugging is off again

safety_checks.message: Have you backed up all important data? This step will erase device.
Device should have 50%+ battery before proceeding
Use good quality USB cable - do not disconnect during process

rollback_if_needed: If unlock fails, you can lock bootloader with: fastboot flashing lock
But this will erase data again
Consider contacting OnePlus support if multiple failures occur
warnings: ⚠️ ALL DATA ON DEVICE WILL BE ERASED
⚠️ Do NOT disconnect USB cable during this process
⚠️ Do NOT power off device during reboot
⚠️ Process takes 5-10 minutes - be patient
⚠️ Device will perform automatic factory reset
✓ This is irreversible once confirmed

commands.title: TWRP Initial Setup

phases.title: Flash Firmware H.41
phases.description: Flash official OnePlus Firmware H.41 using provided tool
phases.warning_mandatory: FIRMWARE FLASHING IS MANDATORY - Skip will cause boot issues

commands.title: Extract Firmware Tool
commands.command: cd ~/OnePlus7Pro_crDroid11/downloads && unzip -o 'OP7Pro firmware flash tool H.41.zip' -d firmware_h41
commands.description: Extract firmware flashing tool

commands.title: Reboot Device to Bootloader
commands.description: Device should still be in TWRP, but bootloader needed for firmware

commands.title: Run Firmware Flash Tool
commands.description: Execute official firmware flashing script
commands.expected_output: Flash tool will run flashing sequence

commands.title: Wait for Flash to Complete
commands.description: Tool will flash baseband, boot, and system firmware

commands.title: Reboot to Recovery After Flash
commands.description: Return to TWRP recovery

important_notes: Firmware H.41 is REQUIRED - do NOT skip
Firmware must be flashed BEFORE ROM installation
Tool may reboot device multiple times - normal behavior
Do NOT disconnect USB during firmware flash
